Package io.goobi.viewer.managedbeans.utils

Class BeanUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.managedbeans.utils.BeanUtils
  • public class BeanUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for methods that use the FacesContext.
